Name: VariableSchemeName
Description: A name for the VariableScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the scheme. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the content and purpose of the VariableScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages and supports the use of structured content.

Name: VariableSchemeReference
Description: Allows for the inclusion of another VariableScheme by reference.

Name: VariableReference
Description: Describes a Variable in-line. This is the applied expression of a data item within a data set.

Name: VariableGroupReference
Description: Contains a group of Variables, which may be ordered or hierarchical.
